flow_area_hub_code,
flow_area_hub_name,
create_user,
update_user,

update_time,
yn,
ts,
) values (

)

insert into work_grid_flow_direction ( ref_work_grid_key, line_type, flow_direction_type, site_code, site_name, org_code, org_name, province_agency_code,province_agency_name,area_hub_code,area_hub_name, flow_site_code, flow_site_name, flow_org_code, flow_org_name, flow_province_agency_code,flow_province_agency_name,flow_area_hub_code,flow_area_hub_name, create_user, create_time ) values
( #{item.refWorkGridKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lineType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.flowDirectionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.siteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.siteName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orgCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.orgName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.provinceAgencyCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.provinceAgencyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.areaHubCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.areaHubName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.flowSiteCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.flowSiteName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.flowOrgCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.flowOrgName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.flowProvinceAgencyCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.flowProvinceAgencyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.flowAreaHubCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.flowAreaHubName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
update work_grid_flow_direction
ref_work_grid_key = #{refWorkGridKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
line_type = #{lineType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flow_direction_type = #{flowDirectionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
site_code = #{siteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
site_name = #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
org_name = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_agency_code = #{provinceAgencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_agency_name = #{provinceAgencyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_hub_code = #{areaHubCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_hub_name = #{areaHubName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_site_code = #{flowSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flow_site_name = #{flowSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_org_code = #{flowOrgCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flow_org_name = #{flowOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_province_agency_code = #{flowProvinceAgencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_province_agency_name = #{flowProvinceAgencyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_area_hub_code = #{flowAreaHubCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_area_hub_name = #{flowAreaHubName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yn = #{yn,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ts = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update work_grid_flow_direction set
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yn = 0 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update work_grid_flow_direction set
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yn = 0 where ref_work_grid_key = #{refWorkGridKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update work_grid_flow_direction set
update_user = #{operateUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yn = 0 where yn = 1 and id in
#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from work_grid_flow_direction t where yn = 1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select line_type,flow_direction_type,flow_site_code,flow_site_name from work_grid_flow_direction t where yn = 1 and ref_work_grid_key = #{refWorkGridKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flow_direction_type = #{flowDirectionType,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by line_type,flow_site_code limit 200

select count(1) from work_grid_flow_detail_offline o
and not exists( select t.flow_site_code from work_grid_flow_direction t
and t.flow_site_code = o.flow_site_code )

select count(1) from work_grid_flow_direction t
and not exists( select 1 from work_grid_flow_detail_offline o
and o.flow_site_code = t.flow_site_code )

select count(1) from work_grid_flow_direction t
and exists( select 1 from work_grid_flow_detail_offline o
and o.flow_site_code = t.flow_site_code )
select id,site_code,flow_site_code from work_grid_flow_direction where yn = 1 and province_agency_code = '' and id > #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by id limit 100

update.foreach:
UPDATE work_grid_flow_direction
province_agency_code = #{item.provinceAgencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_agency_name = #{item.provinceAgencyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_hub_code = #{item.areaHubCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_hub_name = #{item.areaHubName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_province_agency_code = #{item.flowProvinceAgencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_province_agency_name = #{item.flowProvinceAgencyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_area_hub_code = #{item.flowAreaHubCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_area_hub_name = #{item.flowAreaHubName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now()
WHERE yn = 1 AND id = #{item.id}
